body:
Who watches the show? What Doctor is your favorite?

David Tennant is the best!
body_tagged:
Who watches the show? What Doctor is your favorite?

David Tennant is the best!
title: Doctor Who?

replies.body: I watch it. David and Matt were both amazing and I'll never be able to choose between them
replies.body_tagged: I watch it. David and Matt were both amazing and I'll never be able to choose between them

replies.body: I would say Matt and David are my favourites but I have not seen the older versions so I'm unable to make a final decision :/ However Peter Capaldi is slowly turning into my favourites.
replies.body_tagged: I would say Matt and David are my favourites but I have not seen the older versions so I'm unable to make a final decision :/ However Peter Capaldi is slowly turning into my favourites.

replies.body: Capaldi is stroking some genius. I need to catch up fully - but I did like Eccleston's raw style, Tennants swarve and Smith's well, just, Doctoring! The old ones were meehhehe
replies.body_tagged: Capaldi is stroking some genius. I need to catch up fully - but I did like Eccleston's raw style, Tennants swarve and Smith's well, just, Doctoring! The old ones were meehhehe

replies.body: I've only watched the newer series and I have to say I loved all the newer doctors except for Matt Smith. I couldn't stand him to be honest.
replies.body_tagged: I've only watched the newer series and I have to say I loved all the newer doctors except for Matt Smith. I couldn't stand him to be honest.

replies.body: I've been summoned...OH DOCTOR WHOOO!!!!!.Yeah its a cool show but Peter Capaldi Just too grumpy for doctor
replies.body_tagged: I've been summoned...OH DOCTOR WHOOO!!!!!.Yeah its a cool show but Peter Capaldi Just too grumpy for doctor
